Terms & Conditions:-
1.    Payment                             : - 30% advance balance 70% against P.I.
2.    GST/Taxes                         : - 18% Extra / as applicable at the time of dispatch.
3.    Rates                                  : - FOR Sugar Factory.
4.    Delivery Period                  : - 14-16 weeks.
5.    Validity                              : - The prices quoted are valid for 30 days from the date of this offer.
6.    Material Inspection            :- The buyer is at the liberty to inspect or get the material inspected by third party before dispatch at RASCPL, at their cost. The raw materials used for the manufacturing of ordered goods will be pre-tested from the accredited laboratory.
7.    Warranty                            : - All items are guaranteed against manufacturing & workmanship defects. If any, will be replaced at our cost subject to our inspection .
8.    Make                                  : - OUR MAKE BRAND NAME CRISTO.
